TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WebAppCallsWebApiAuthenticationBuilderExtensions extends System.Object

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder AddMicrosoftWebAppCallsWebApi (this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder builder, Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration configuration, string configSectionName = "AzureAd", string openIdConnectScheme = "OpenIdConnect");

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder AddMicrosoftWebAppCallsWebApi(class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder builder, class Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration configuration, string configSectionName, string openIdConnectScheme) cil managed

<Extension()> Public Function AddMicrosoftWebAppCallsWebApi (builder As AuthenticationBuilder, configuration As IConfiguration, Optional configSectionName As String = "AzureAd", Optional openIdConnectScheme As String = "OpenIdConnect") As AuthenticationBuilder

Docs.param: The to which to add this configuration.
The name of the configuration section with the necessary settings to initialize authentication options.

Optional name for the OpenID Connect authentication scheme (by default, OpenIdConnectDefaults.AuthenticationScheme). This can be specified when you want to support several OpenID Connect identity providers.
Docs.summary: Add MSAL support to the web app or web API. This method expects the configuration file will have a section, named "AzureAd" as default, with the necessary settings to initialize authentication options.
Docs.remarks: This method cannot be used with Azure AD B2C, as with B2C an initial scope needs to be provided.
